about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through both traditional and fantasy worlds.

Unveil the magic and intrigue of our episodic power fantasy visual novel, currently in active development. Experience the entire First Episode, "Inheritance," through an engaging free demo and the first half of Season 1 through Episode 4: Bound in Twilight in the live build with 4 to 5 more episodes planned!



Step into the rich tapestry of creation, where diverse realms interweave. Each realm, governed by its deities and spirits, was once guided by ancient laws. But time has seen even the mightiest deities depart, leaving a void that strains the fabric of existence.

As more realms are left to fend for themselves, the balance that sustains the cycle begins to falter. Cracks emerge, and those who ascend will find themselves drifting through the fractures that form.



Among these fractured realms, the ancient Earthen realm stands as a linchpin. Mysterious vanishings ripple across the world, concealed by conspiracy theories and wild assumptions. But as fractures spread and chaos escalates, can these explanations endure?

Join Aaron Stevens (name customizable) as he delves into his uncle's mysterious passing and a closely guarded ancestral secret. Forge new alliances, rekindle old flames, and navigate the intricate landscapes of the Earthen Realm and the fantastical realm of Arboria.

Detailed Information Below - May contain spoilers!



Fractured Realms - Season 1: The Veiled Kingdom is a romantic fantasy adult visual novel with political intrigue and mystery throughout. At its core Fractured Realms is a harem novel and you will be able to view most content with all the main girls on a single play-through.

Choice! - Fractured Realms is your adventure – make impactful choices that shape your destiny, especially within romantic encounters.

👥 Character Personalization: From the names of your main love interests to the paths you tread with them, wield authority over your relationships. Opt out of romantic involvements without excluding characters from the narrative.
🔞 Tailored Adult Content: Empower yourself with full control over intimate scenes. Decide which interactions involve harem members and to what extent – you're the architect of your experience.
💬 Interactive Dialogues: Engage in a plethora of dialogue options that both impact and don't impact the story. Designed as a harem there's no need for subsequent play-through attempts unless you wish to experience the story only having relations with individual characters.

Join the community in smashing bugs, and typos, and talking about the story in our Discord:

content_descriptors.notes: There are optional adult scenes with the main love interests introduced throughout the story. Any of these scenes can be ignored and the story will adjust as such.
